DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.

DATA_COMP: From January 1968 onwards: monthly consolidated financial statements. Between September 1948 and December 1967: Return of Deutsche Bank - II Deutsche Bundesbank. Between 1876 and 1948: Deutsches Geld- und Bankwesen in Zahlen 1876 bis 1945.
